tha-ap296:0.3_0: He then used sound as a regular monk.
tha-ap296:1.1_0: when the sun has come up—
tha-ap296:1.3_0: Remember the world of the Buddha,
tha-ap296:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap296:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap296:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Vāsava.
tha-ap296:6.1_0: with the most senior monk who is a fourth part of the senior.
